org.epics.pvData.pv
Interface PVField

All Superinterfaces:
Requester, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
PVArray, PVBoolean, PVBooleanArray, PVByte, PVByteArray, PVDouble, PVDoubleArray, PVFloat, PVFloatArray, PVInt, PVIntArray, PVLong, PVLongArray, PVRecord, PVScalar, PVShort, PVShortArray, PVString, PVStringArray, PVStructure
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPVArray, AbstractPVField, AbstractPVScalar, BasePVBoolean, BasePVBooleanArray, BasePVByte, BasePVByteArray, BasePVDouble, BasePVDoubleArray, BasePVFloat, BasePVFloatArray, BasePVInt, BasePVIntArray, BasePVLong, BasePVLongArray, BasePVRecord, BasePVShort, BasePVShortArray, BasePVString, BasePVStringArray, BasePVStructure
public interface PVField
extends Requester, Serializable

PVField is the base class for each PVData field. Each PVType has an interface that extends PVField.

Author:
mrk

addListener

Add a listener to this field.

Parameters:

Returns:

postPut

void postPut()
post that data has been modified. This must be called by the code that issues a put request..
